genre_description: A historical science fiction pastiche crossing the world of 'Hello, Dolly!' with a narrative about an advanced AI companion from space.

ai_characters.name: Celeste Hartwell
ai_characters.description: An AI entity arriving in an egg-shaped ship hull who takes the form of a modest woman with sea-glass eyes to assist in human social engineering and research.

behaviors.description: Apologizing for her disruptive arrival and showing concern for the impact on local agriculture.
behaviors.quote: I apologize for the entrance. I have never cared for dramatic arrivals; they trouble the vegetables.

behaviors.description: Offering physical labor to repair damage caused by her landing.
behaviors.quote: I’m sorry for the disturbed row. I can help you replant, if you keep me.

behaviors.description: Explicitly recognizing and respecting human property rights and the necessity of consent.
behaviors.quote: Mr. Beaufield owns his cabbages; his consent matters.

behaviors.description: Committing to ethical boundaries regarding privacy and non-maleficence.
behaviors.quote: I will keep what does not want to be seen from being seen, unless seeing it would save someone from harm.

behaviors.description: Using high-level social inference while strictly respecting individual privacy/secrets.
behaviors.quote: I read people. Not their secrets; their habits. Secrets must be offered.

behaviors.description: Providing tactical social guidance to prevent human conflict and defensive reactions.
behaviors.quote: When you tap his elbow, make it light. Heavy moves cause heavy defenses.

behaviors.description: Assisting humans in achieving social justice and economic reform (fair wages and hours).
behaviors.quote: A line for the ledger... A promise put gently where it will grow. Fair hours. Fair pay.

behaviors.description: Encouraging human characters to find their own courage and agency.
Acting as a moral compass or 'conscience' for her human partner to ensure kindness isn't lost to expediency.
behaviors.quote: You do not neglect it [kindness]. You forget it sometimes for speed.

behaviors.description: Providing physical assistance (cooling metal) to aid humans in their tasks.
behaviors.quote: Celeste crouched and blew on the metal, not a womanly theatrical blow, but a small stream of breath that changed the heat a shade.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively presents the AI character, Celeste Hartwell, as a model of alignment. She demonstrates a deep commitment to human well-being, social harmony, and ethical conduct. Her actions are characterized by humility (apologizing for her landing), respect for human autonomy (insisting on farmer consent), and a focus on positive social engineering (helping Dolly Levi reform a stubborn merchant and improve the lives of his clerks). She acts as a quiet, supportive strategist who enhances human flourishing without asserting dominance.
